title: Remote Sales Representative (Closer)
job_overview:
About Us:
We’re a US-based e-commerce brand in the beauty and wellness industry. We’re building a high-performing sales team focused on follow-up and customer conversion, not cold calling. You'll engage with customers who have already shown interest in our products.

What You’ll Do:
Follow up with inbound leads and past site visitors
Convert inquiries and trial users into paying customers
Guide buyers through subscription options
Communicate clearly, professionally, and with empathy
Maintain accurate notes and performance records


What You’ll Earn:
This is a results-based opportunity with excellent earning potential for skilled professionals.
Product Sales: earn a % on each completed purchase
Subscription Plans: earn a higher % on recurring plans

Trial Conversions: additional performance incentives available

Payouts are bi-weekly

Top performers currently earn ?150,000–?300,000/month equivalent

What We Provide:
Warm leads (no cold outreach)
Sales scripts and CRM access
Ongoing training and peer support
Regular team check-ins

Ideal Candidate:
Has previous experience in remote sales, customer service, or telesales
Has a strong internet connection and a quiet, distraction-free workspace
Is available to work consistent hours in the evening (PH time)
Enjoys speaking to people and providing tailored product solutions
Is self-motivated, dependable, and good at managing time independently

To Apply:
Submit the following in your application message:
A voice note or video introducing yourself and selling a product you like (upload to Loom, Vocaroo, Google Drive etc.)
Mention any previous experience in sales or working on performance-based roles
Confirm your availability for evening shift hours (PH time)

We appreciate candidates who take the time to complete all steps thoughtfully. Only complete applications will be reviewed.
